core

Interface EmitterInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Emitter, OutNode, PolyOutNode

    public interface EmitterInterface
    Emitter interface is one of the two base elements of all the inter-object communication. It provide a generic emitter/slot infrastructure using the Value to pass any kind of data. It emit value to all the connected slots.
    Author:
    martino

      • isPolyvalent
